required.name: Belarus
required.note: Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival. In the case of transit visas, these may be obtained on arrival with a hotel confirmation, return ticket and visa to a 3rd country for a maximum validity of 2 calendar days.

required.name: Cameroon
required.note: Holders of a pre-arranged approval issued by "Le Delegue General de la Surete" can obtain a visa on arrival

required.name: Guyana
required.note: Those travelling as tourists can obtain a visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days provided holding a letter of invitation from sponsor or host. Otherwise, pre-arrival visa is required.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Holders of written e-visa approval issued by Immigration Authority Headquarters in Abuja, can obtain a visa on arrival

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply. Business visa on arrival or Tourist visa on arrival when travelling as part of a group through a designated tour operator. Otherwise, a visa should be obtained in advance from a Pakistani embassy or consulate.

required.name: Russia
required.note: Holders of an APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC) travelling on business do not require a visa

required.name: Saudi Arabia
required.note: Saudi Arabia does not issue tourist visas at present.

required.name: Sierra Leone
required.note: Holders of a copy of a pre-arranged visa can obtain a visa on arrival.

required.name: South Sudan
required.note: Foreign nationals of South Sudan origin can obtain a visa on arrival.

required.name: Sudan
required.note: Pre-Approved Visa can be obtained on arrival

required.name: Ukraine
required.note: Invitation letter is not required for Singaporean citizens.

not-required.name: Austria
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Belgium
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Czech Republic
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Denmark
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Estonia
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Finland
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: France
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area (in Regions of France)

not-required.name: Germany
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Greece
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Hungary
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Iceland
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Italy
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Kazakhstan
not-required.note: 15 days; as part of the 2nd phase of No Visa Pilot Programme valid from 16 July 2015 to 31 December 2017.

not-required.name: Latvia
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Liechtenstein
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Lithuania
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Luxembourg
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Netherlands
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area (European Netherlands)

not-required.name: Norway
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Poland
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Portugal
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Slovakia
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Slovenia
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Spain
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Sweden
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Switzerland
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area

not-required.name: Tunisia
not-required.note: 3 months. An exit fee of 30 Tunisian Dinars is required for non-residents exiting Tunisia.

not-required.name: United States
not-required.note: 90 days on arrival from overseas; ESTA (valid for 2 years when issued) required if arriving by air or cruise ship.

evisa.name: Australia
evisa.note: 90 days on each visit in 12-month period if granted. May enter using SmartGate on arrival in Australia

evisa.name: Canada
evisa.note: 6 months for overland or cruise ship arrivals. eTA required for air arrivals.

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: Must be arriving at Port Bouet Airport and hold an International Certificate of Vaccination. The E Visa can be acquired on http://www.snedai.com/

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Passengers arriving at Libreville International Airport do not need a visa if they have filled out the online Electronic Authorization Form. Approval process takes up to 72 hours following submission of the visa waiver request.

evisa.name: Myanmar
evisa.note: 28 days. eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports. Starting from 1 December 2016, Singaporean Citizens will be able to visit Myanmar without a visa for up to 30 Days.

evisa.name: São Tomé and Príncipe
evisa.note: Visa is obtained online at http://www.smf.st/virtualvisa/.

on-arrival.name: Armenia
on-arrival.note: 120 days. Obtainable on arrival at Zvartnots International Airport or Georgia-Armenia border checkpoint or, prior to travel, online.

on-arrival.name: Bahrain
on-arrival.note: 14 days. May also be obtained online in the form of an E-Visa

on-arrival.name: Bangladesh
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Djibouti
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Dominican Republic
on-arrival.note: 30 days (USD10 Tourist Card must be purchased upon arrival)

on-arrival.name: Jordan
on-arrival.note: Visa is issued free of charge in most circumstances. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendible for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or stamp in the passport, and in possession of phone number & address to be visited in Lebanon, and a non-refundable onward ticket.

on-arrival.name: Madagascar
on-arrival.note: 30 days free of charge; extension possible for a fee.

on-arrival.name: Seychelles
on-arrival.note: 1 month, issued to all travellers free of charge.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note: 30 days, must hold an invitation letter issued at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Sri Lanka
on-arrival.note: Visas are issued on arrival free of charge with a validity of 30 days, extendible for another 150 days

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days at Dushanbe International Airport. Visa also available online. E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points but obtainable at Presidente Nicolau Lobato International Airport or at Dili Sea Port. Transit: USD20, tourist USD30: business USD50.

on-arrival.name: United Arab Emirates
on-arrival.note: Visa on Arrival is issued free of charge for stays not exceeding 30 Days, extension is possible for a fee.
